value.ai_summary: RESTRunner is a comprehensive .NET 10 solution designed for automated REST API testing, performance benchmarking, and regression testing, with a primary focus on integrating Postman collections for efficient API validation. The project offers a multi-faceted approach to API testing, featuring automated test execution, performance analysis, load testing capabilities, and detailed reporting through CSV exports, alongside a Razor Pages web interface for interactive testing. Leveraging modern .NET technologies, the solution implements high-performance testing methodologies with significant build and execution speed improvements (19% and 25% respectively), and provides robust features like response time percentile tracking, success rate monitoring, and comprehensive statistics generation. The architecture appears modular, supporting cross-platform deployment (Windows, macOS, Linux) and emphasizing security and package optimization, with 93% of packages at their latest versions and zero known vulnerabilities. Targeted primarily at software developers, API engineers, and QA professionals, RESTRunner distinguishes itself through its seamless Postman collection integration, performance-centric design, and built-in sample CRUD API for demonstration and testing purposes.
